attributes.action: convert York college into a new night club like the gallery as it is useless as a college
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
there is not enough room in the college for:
eating, studying, socialising.. so open plan its quite pervy.

There is room for: severql bars ( 2 on each of the 4 floors) and rooms for hire.

Please sign this petition, it is for a great cause.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
